thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Sureya

author: Sureya
title: Sureya
text: This is my second time booking with flight hub. I loved that they gave the cheapest prices and booking was simple and easy. Great deals and the site is safe, my first trip, everything went smoothly at the airport where I printed out my boarding pass. I was worried about booking online at first as I usually book with an agent but flight hub helped me over come this fear and hopefully I'll be becoming with them for future trips
